CustomField.description: Color code to set as the background color for tiles representing the package in the Development Pipeline tab. Use a 6-character HTML Hex Color Code, e.g "FF0000"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Color code to set as the background color for tiles representing the package in the Development Pipeline tab. Use a 6-character HTML Hex Color Code, e.g "FF0000"
CustomField.label: Color Code
